monogr.title: The theatre of the empire of Great Britaine : presenting an exact geography of the kingdomes of England, Scotland, Ireland, and the iles adioyning: with the shires, hundreds, cities and shire-townes, within ye kingdome of England, divided and described by Iohn Speed

div.head: In exactissimi huius operis Authorem, Eulogium

lg.l: VIncta di •• , rumpat despecta, silentia lingua,
Culmina vt immensi memorem superata laboris
Speide tui: insuetâ iactor licèt, (optime,) curâ,
Quam tibi pro merito possim circundare palmam
Qui coeant populi, quaecunque sub orbe Britanno
Digna refers, vno aspectu, scriptoque, locoque,
Ad nostra exactum deducis tempora filum.
Ergô erit haec magni merces non parua laboris,
Egregium pariunt haec quòd monumenta decorem
Ipsasibi, ventura quòd haec mirabitur aetas,
